publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3599 Willie Coffey: Ayrshire Employment Task Force—That the Parliament recognises that the economic downturn has been felt strongly across Ayrshire, particularly in the manufacturing and retail sectors; welcomes the establishment of the Ayrshire Employment Task Force through which a range of agencies will be working together, including the three Ayrshire councils, JobcentrePlus, Scottish Enterprise, Business Gateway, Ayrshire Chamber of Commerce and Industry, the Federation of Small Businesses and Kilmarnock College; notes that the task force will gather and share information about companies that are experiencing trading difficulties to ensure that effective, coordinated support is made available to those businesses and their employees; further welcomes the business summit to be held in the Park Hotel, Kilmarnock, on Tuesday 24 March, and congratulates all of the agencies for their commitment to working together in the interests of Ayrshire’s communities.
